about_the_game:
• Background:

World War I. The Western Front. You are the only surviving person from your troop. Your retreat has been cut off, and the fires of war rage all around you. As you come to the brink of despair, you suddenly think of a last-ditch effort that just might work -- dig a trench toward the enemy camp!


  • About this game:

This is a first-person shooter game set in the First World War, where players can find and destroy enemies by digging trenches in the battlefield. You can team up with friends and arm yourself with a variety of weapons scattered throughout the trenches.


  • The trench is a treasure trove:

As you dig your way toward the enemy camp, you may find power-boosting weapons. Aside from the common firearms and knives, there are also all sorts of promising weapons such as ambush-style signal bombs that expose the enemy position, poison gas, gas masks, flak jackets, scopes, and sniper rifles.


  • Trench Maze:

Create a maze of trenches the enemy can't escape from.


  • Solo or Co-op Fights:

You can choose to go it alone or form a team.

name: Trench Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / Phenom x4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This is a first-person shooter game set in the First World War, where players can find and destroy enemies by digging trenches in the battlefield. You can team up with friends and arm yourself with a variety of weapons scattered throughout the trenches.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
